enchantment.celestial_enchantments.accel: Right click on the crop to consume some durability to ripen the crop
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.apopt: After attacking, give the target a [Enchantment Level] * 2 second fade effect
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.arrow: After hitting the target, drag all entities within a radius of [enchantment level]+1 grid with the target as the center to the target
Arrow damage reduced by [Enchantment Level] * 5%, dealing original damage [Enchantment Level] * 10% projectile damage to enemies around the target upon hit
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.blood: Restore original damage * [enchantment level] * 10% health after attack
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.born_: Durability will slowly recover in areas with brightness less than 5
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.burst: After hitting the target, there is a [Enchantment Level] * 20% chance of an explosion, which does not damage the blocks
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.celes: When damaged, a single attack can only receive up to 25% of the wearer's maximum health
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.clust: For every creature of the same type around the user, increase [Enchantment Level] * 12% of attack damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.const: After 4 attacks per block, deal 50% of the original damage [enchantment level] * magic damage to the attacker on the next block
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.corru: When picking up experience, increase [Enchantment Level] * 80% experience acquisition, but there is a 25% chance of [Enchantment Level] * obtaining negative effects
When attacked, reduces the attacker's enchantment level by 3 points of armor for a period of time
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.death: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 5% of the target's maximum health attack damage during attack, with a maximum damage limit of [Enchantment Level] * 75
Increase [Enchantment Level] * 25% critical damage on critical strikes
Deals [Enchantment Level] * 15 magic damage to surrounding creatures upon death
When nearby players with Death Pact die, there is a 15% chance of [Enchantment Level] to gain strength, increase speed, restore health, and absorb damage. Otherwise, you will die together
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.destr: Deals one [Enchantment Level] * 2 attack damage to surrounding targets after being attacked
Add a crack mark to the target after the attack. If you have a crack mark, you cannot gain invincible time after being attacked
Increase explosion damage received by 40%, and increase other damage by 25%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.dimen: Gain 30 seconds of [Enchantment Level] level luck, strength, and urgency effects after crossing dimension each time
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.divin: The farther away from the attacking target, the higher the damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.echo_: When receiving a fatal attack, dodge the damage and restore [Enchantment Level] * 5% of maximum health. This effect cools down for 600 seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.explo: The thrown trident has a [Enchantment Level] * 20% chance of exploding
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.eye_i: Continuously achieve night vision effects in areas with brightness less than 5
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.fierc: If you have attacked a creature in a short period of time, increase [Enchantment Level] * 10% of attack damage when attacking again
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.firep: Immune to Magma Block damage and reduce flame damage taken by 15%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.fleet: After attacking, give the target 4 seconds to be poisoned. When the target is poisoned, the attack damage increases by [Enchantment Level] * 25%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.frost: Deals [Enchantment Level] damage to the attacker when attacked, and grants the target a slow effect
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.gift_: When attacked by lightning, immediately recover 100% of lost life and obtain a brief [Enchantment Level] level speed increase and resistance enhancement effect
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.have_: After waking up from bed, obtain [enchantment level] level health recovery and jump enhancement effects
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.heart: When attacked, causes the attacker to fall into [Enchantment Level] * 2 seconds of combustion
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.hidde: When equipped with stealth effect, the attack target increases [Enchantment Level] * 26% of attack damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.holy_: Attacked while stealth gains health recovery effect
Obtain a short-term damage absorption effect after using a shield to block attacks
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.knigh: Attack damage increased by [Enchantment Level] * 15% while riding
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.knowl: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 10% experience acquisition when picking up experience
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.light: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 25% attack damage when attacking targets with armor values below 8
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.magic: Your attack will receive additional magic damage equal to the original damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.moon_: Continuously gain [Enchantment Level] level health recovery effect while at night
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.morni: After the arrow hits the target, it will summon lightning with a 50% chance of [enchantment level] times
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.origi: There is a probability of obtaining resistance improvement or speed improvement effects when receiving treatment
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.overe: Continuously obtain [Enchantment Level] level hunger effect
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.parti: Restore 8 health points to surrounding players at their enchantment level upon death
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.photo: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 12% mining speed in areas with brightness above 10
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.potio: The duration of the obtained potion effect has been increased by [Enchantment Level] * 15%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.pure_: Continuously clearing the potion effect on the body
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.quenc: When attacking a burning target, extinguish the target's flame and increase [Enchantment Level] * 10% attack damage every 2 seconds based on the remaining burning time before extinguishment
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.quick: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 16% of attack damage when attacking the target while running, and repel the target with higher repulsion force
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.rain_: Continuously restores the wearer's life during rainy weather
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.react: After using a shield to block an attack, use [Enchantment Level] * 0.5 to repel the attacker
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.reven: Attacking a target that has recently attacked oneself increases [Enchantment Level] by 10% of attack damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.scorc: Using a shield to block an attack will cause the attacker to fall into [Enchantment Level] and burn for seconds
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.shado: When attacking in areas with brightness less than 5, deal an additional [enchantment level] point of void damage to the target
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.sharp: Increase [Enchantment Level] * 20% melee and throw damage
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.solid: When the wearer's health is less than half, the damage received is reduced by [Enchantment Level] * 12%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.sun_b: Continuously gains [Enchantment Level] strength effects while in the daytime
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.suppr: After the attack, the target will no longer be able to regain life
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.the_h: When killing a target, the probability of the target dropping the equipment they are wearing increases to 100%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.the_s: When attacked, there is a 20% chance of [Enchantment Level] * making the attacker the target of surrounding creatures
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.traum: When hit, restore lost HP * [Enchantment Level] * 9% HP
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.unsta: When attacking, there is a [Enchantment Level] * 10% chance to increase the damage of this attack by 25%
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.upwar: Give the target a brief floating effect
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.void_: Reduce attack damage by 90%, deal original damage * [enchantment level] * 50% damage to surrounding targets after attack
Reduce [Enchantment Level] * 8% of Void damage received
enchantment.celestial_enchantments.words: Increase attack damage by 5% for every level 5 experience level, with a maximum of [enchantment level] * 20%
